fields.name: Repoman
fields.description: 10 or more repositories on Github

fields.name: 99 Problems
fields.description: Issues raised against least one or your repositories

fields.name: Party Of Five
fields.description: Have at least 5 users following you on Github

fields.name: Lemming
fields.description: Following over 100 programmers on Github

fields.name: You Forker
fields.description: Having at least one of your repositories as a fork of another

fields.name: Like A Boss
fields.description: Be the owner of one or more public repositories

fields.name: WIKI WIKI YEAH
fields.description: At least one of your repositories has a wiki

fields.name: Microsoft
fields.description: Having at least one private repository

fields.name: Get That Pandemic
fields.description: Have at least one repository that you can push to directly

fields.name: Linus
fields.description: Having at least one public repository

fields.name: Kicking It Old School
fields.description: Commit to a repository that has been inactive for over a year.

fields.name: We Are Family
fields.description: At least having one collaborator on Github

fields.name: Mega Repository
fields.description: Having a disk usage over 9000

fields.name: Love Letter
fields.description: Having a created at least one private gist

fields.name: Task List
fields.description: Having a created at least one public gist

fields.name: Pardon My French
fields.description: Swearing at least once in one of your repositories

fields.name: Tag Your It
fields.description: Tagging at least one of your repositories

fields.name: Olive Branch
fields.description: Branching at least on of your repositories

fields.name: They Love Me, They Really Love Me
fields.description: Having at least one for your repositories downloaded at least once

fields.name: They See Me Rolling, They Hating
fields.description: Having at least 2 watchers on one for your repositories

fields.name: Top Commiter
fields.description: The most commits to a particular repository

fields.name: Google Me, Bitch.
fields.description: Having the homepage set for at least one of your repositories
